entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
